thread.title: VIDEO: Former Milan and Tottenham midfielder Boateng nets impressive basketball trick shot
thread.title_full: VIDEO: Former Milan and Tottenham midfielder Boateng nets impressive basketball trick shot

title: VIDEO: Former Milan and Tottenham midfielder Boateng nets impressive basketball trick shot
text:
0 Mar 14, 2017 20:58:43 The Ghana international, who is now in Spain with Las Palmas, has been showing that his ability to hit the net is not restricted to the football field 
Kevin Prince-Boateng has led a rather nomadic existence of late, but the Ghana international has been showing that his ability remains without question. 
Now 30 years of age, the experienced midfielder is currently turning out in Spain for Las Palmas. 
WATCH: Chinese star's bizarre Pato antics 
He has spent time with Milan and Schalke in the last couple of years, while previously taking in spells with Tottenham and Portsmouth while in England. 
Boateng has always possessed the creative talent to help him stand out from the crowd, with it his attitude that has been more of an issue at times. 
He is, however, happy with his football at present and has taken to Instagram to show any of his doubters that he has still got a special touch. A post shared by @prince09_ on Mar 14, 2017 at 10:49am PDT 
Boateng has impressed for Las Palmas this season, netting seven times in 22 appearances across all competitions. 
He certainly knows how to find the back of the net, with those skills clearly not restricted to the football field. Related
